title: Organizational Learning Strategies for Achieving Gender Equality in the Workplace

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic workplace organizational culture and foundational concepts of gender equality
context.additional_context: A course focused on organizational learning methodologies for gender equality improvement targeting current mathematics professionals

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to diagnose gender equality status within organizations and develop data-driven improvement plans.
Strengthen the ability to design gender equality policy improvement strategies through systematic reflection.
Acquire the ability to apply organizational learning processes, including external benchmarking and goal setting.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
